name: Paparazzi io (opoly)
description:
Paparazzi io is a game that celebrates the craziness of the paparazzi. Collect the most famous paparazzi hangout spots, and Play Hard!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
